Package concurrency.control

Provides classes that implement concurrency control protocols.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcurrencyController<V>
    A ConcurrencyController controls concurrent execution of Transactions in a manner that achieves conflict-serializability.
    Strict2PLConcurrencyController<V>
    The Strict2PLConcurrencyController class implements the strict 2 phase-locking protocol.
    TimestampConcurrencyController<V>
    The TimestampConcurrencyController class implements timestamp-based concurrency control.
    TimestampConcurrencyControllerTWR<V>
    The TimestampConcurrencyControllerTWR class implements timestamp-based concurrency control with Thomas' write rule.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConcurrencyController.AbortException
    An AbortException is thrown if a Transaction needs to be aborted.
    ConcurrencyController.InvalidTransactionIDException
    An InvalidTransactionIDException is thrown if an invalid Transaction ID is given to a ConcurrencyController.

Package concurrency.control Description

Provides classes that implement concurrency control protocols.
Author:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
